message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $160 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, $160 is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $80 right now. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but $80 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $120?  It's a fair price for a product of this quality.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $120 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $100. If you're open to that, I'm ready to make a deal.
